title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams ends longshot re-election bid
shortDescription: Without Adams, former Gov. Andrew Cuomo likely gets a more favorable rematch against Zohran Mamdani in the November general election.

title: Trump to send troops to Portland, Oregon
shortDescription: Trump said on social media he's sending troops to Portland, Oregon, to protect immigration facilities. Oregon officials call the action illegal and unwarranted.

title: Vance tells Russia to 'wake up,' echoing Trump's shift in tone
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said on Fox News Sunday that Moscow needs to "wake up and accept reality," as the Trump administration tries to end the war.

title: Trump plans to attend all-hands meeting of top military leaders
shortDescription: The president will attend the mystery, last-minute meeting of the military's top brass on Sept. 30.

title: Trump says 'we will get it done' in the Middle East
shortDescription: President Trump will meet Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday at the White House with the aim of reaching a framework for a deal.

title: Trump to meet with congressional leaders as government shutdown looms
shortDescription: President Trump will meet with congressional leaders at the White House on Monday, Sept. 29 ahead of a potential government shutdown.

title: Trump administration says it will revoke Colombian president's visa
shortDescription: The State Department said it is revoking Colombian President Gustavo Petro's visa over comments he made at a pro-Palestinian rally in New York.

title: Trump claims he's sending the military into Portland
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump will send the military into Portland, Ore, to protect the ICE facilities there, he said in a Truth Social post.

title: Trump orders troops to Portland; Oregon senator: 'Stay the hell out'
shortDescription: Trump said he's sending troops to Portland to protect immigration facilities. Oregon officials call the action illegal and unwarranted.

title: DOJ asks Supreme Court if Trump can end birthright citizenship
shortDescription: The Justice Department wants the justices to decide whether Trump's proposal seeking to reinterpret the Constitution's 14th Amendment is lawful.

title: Why is Trump imposing tariffs on cabinets? Here is what we know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced new tariffs on cabinets, saying he wants to bring furniture businesses back to the Carolinas and Michigan.

title: Trump, Epstein DC statue removed. Organizers call it 'heartbreaking.'
shortDescription: A "Friendship Month" statue of President Donald Trump and sex offender Jeffrey Epstein holding hands was removed from DC by the National Park Service.

title: Will Charlie Kirk's death fuel a GOP movement? Watch this election.
shortDescription: This year’s Virginia governor’s race will test whether outrage over Charlie Kirk's death will galvanize Gen-Z conservatives to vote.

title: ICE fires projectiles at Chicagoans aiming to shut down Trump’s Midway Blitz
shortDescription: Anti-immigration enforcement protesters have been gathering outside the local U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement at nearly all hours.

title: Trump delves into Amelia Earhart mystery, orders records released
shortDescription: Earhart is described by the Smithsonian as "probably the most famous female pilot in aviation history."

title: Supreme Court won't make Trump spend billions in foreign aid for now
shortDescription: The Supreme Court's conservative majority blocked a ruling that the administration commit to spending the foreign assistance before the funds expire.

title: Here's how Donald Trump and James Comey's relationship turned bad
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s relationship with his first FBI director, James Comey, started off friendly but soon eroded, leading to recent charges.

title: `Lordy, I hope there are tapes.' James Comey, Trump and DC's big dramas
shortDescription: From the 9/11 terrorist attacks to the 2016 election and the tempestuous Trump administrations, James Comey has been at the center of pivotal events.
